meanings.definition: Suitable for giving as a gift.
meanings.sent1: This scarf is giftable because it is pretty and nicely wrapped.
meanings.sent2: The book with the shiny cover is giftable for the holiday season.
meanings.sent3: The giftable box of chocolates made everyone smile at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was a giftable moment that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The colorful bouquet of flowers was truly giftable and brought joy to the recipient.

meanings.definition: Able to be given as a gift.
meanings.sent1: The small figurine is giftable due to its delicate design.
meanings.sent2: She found a giftable necklace that matched her friend's style perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The giftable toy car made the child jump with excitement.
meanings.sent4: His words were a giftable reminder of the importance of friendship.
meanings.sent5: The beautifully wrapped present was undeniably giftable and brought smiles all around.
